searchPageTemplates.default_template_content: Could you tell me something about $[keywords]? If possible, could you give me some links about it? If the $[keywords] question is code related, just post the code
searchPageTemplates.question_keywords_template_content: List your most popular question about $[keywords]. Then answer this question. Finally, list 4 more questions.
searchPageTemplates.keywords_template_content: $[keywords] are my Google search keywords. Please give me 5 sets of related keywords.
